casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. EDWARD JOHN GLENN, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 9399 DATED this 24th day of April, 1975.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of 12 years for Criminal Sale of Dangerous Drugs imposed on November 1st, 1974, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Jeff Sherlock of the Montana Defender Project for his assistance to the defendant and to this court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Jack L. Green, Robert C. Sykes.
